statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY rating DESC, created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND rating IN (3, 4) ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT feedback_id, rating, created_at FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 3
SELECT customer_name, created_at FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, reviews.rating FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id ORDER BY reviews.rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(customer_id) AS review_count FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, review_text, rating FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM feedback_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM review_table WHERE star_rating > 3;
SELECT product_id, review_text FROM review_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = '123456789'
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE product_id = '987654321'
SELECT customer_id, product_id, timestamp FROM review_table WHERE star_rating > 3
SELECT suggestion_text, timestamp FROM suggestion_table WHERE customer_id = '987654321'
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductReviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score >= 8 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT quality_id, product_id, quality_score FROM ProductQuality ORDER BY quality_score DESC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score >= 5 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, customer_id, rating FROM ReviewRating ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, quality_rating FROM ProductQuality WHERE quality_rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_text FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, product_id FROM ReviewRating GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT product_name, quality_rating FROM ProductQuality ORDER BY quality_rating DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT fa.analysis_id, fa.analysis_text, fb.feedback_text, rr.rating FROM FeedbackAnalysis fa JOIN CustomerFeedback fb ON fa.feedback_id = fb.feedback_id JOIN ReviewRating rr ON fa.review_id = rr.review_id WHERE rr.rating >= 4;
